com.github.jknack.handlebars.io

Class FileTemplateLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.jknack.handlebars.io.AbstractTemplateLoader
      • com.github.jknack.handlebars.io.URLTemplateLoader
        • com.github.jknack.handlebars.io.FileTemplateLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TemplateLoader

    public class FileTemplateLoader
extends URLTemplateLoader
    Load templates from the file system. A base path must be specified at creation time. The base path serve as template repository.
    Since:
    0.1.0
